lead_paragraph: Two namesake coaches who have propelled Russian synchronized swimming to one medal after another hope to blow rivals out of the water once again at the Rio Olympic Games.

headline.print_headline: Namesake Russia Coaches Groom Synchro Stars for More Gold
headline.main: Namesake Russia Coaches Groom Synchro Stars for More Gold

snippet: Two namesake coaches who have propelled Russian synchronized swimming to one medal after another hope to blow rivals out of the water once again at the Rio Olympic Games....
